pr_title: The Gradle plugin to use linkage checker 1.5.2

timeline.message: Gradle plugin to use linkage checker 1.5.2

timeline.bodyText: classPahBuilder was correct. ClassPathEntry is the element type, not the list type.
timeline.author: elharo

timeline.bodyText: Because this is classPathBuilder, I renamed the existing classPathBuilder to something else.
timeline.author: suztomo
